mapper.update: UPDATE pms_spu_info SET publish_status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{spuId}
mapper.select: SELECT spu.id, spu.spu_name, spu.spu_description, spu.catalog_id, brand.name AS brand_name, image.img_url AS image FROM pms_spu_info spu INNER JOIN pms_sku_info sku ON spu.id = sku.spu_id INNER JOIN pms_brand brand ON spu.brand_id = brand.brand_id INNER JOIN pms_spu_images image ON spu.id = image.spu_id WHERE sku.sku_id = #{skuId} AND image.default_img = 1
